channel.title: Cloud
channel.description: Single Pane of Glass for Everything (AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, ...) with SteampipeRight now, I am connected to a PostgreSQL database and you are thinking that is boring. Who wants to see me querying a database? Well… Wait until you see what I can query from such a database.

item.title: Single Pane of Glass for Everything (AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, ...) with Steampipe
item.description: Right now, I am connected to a PostgreSQL database and you are thinking that is boring. Who wants to see me querying a database? Well… Wait until you see what I can query from such a database.
